title: PLAZA / COIN-OPERATED VIEWER I
description: A coin-operated viewer on the plaza. It offers a view to the sunken sea-fort.

dialogueTree.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "This coin-operated viewer is facing..."
dialogueTree.text: This coin-operated viewer is facing South. The instruction manual says to insert twenty five *centims* and pull the handle while looking inside, then use the focus knob to zoom in if necessary.

links.title: You: ""What's a tourist attraction doing...."
links.text: "What's a tourist attraction doing... here?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a revitalization project..."
links.text: "There was a revitalization project in '49. A design studio tried restoring Martinaise to its pre-war glory." The lieutenant looks around and concludes: "It didn't stick."

links.title: You: ""What happened?""
links.text: "What happened?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They got as far as the street lamp..."
links.text: "They got as far as the street lamps and the statue on that intersection. Then something went sour." He lowers his voice. "I suspect that *something* was Evrart Claire -- the Union leader. He muscled them out. It's how it usually goes around here."

links.title: You: ""Cool. I dig organized crime. It's..."
links.text: "Cool. I dig organized crime. It's the best."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's odd. I could swear you were..."
links.text: "That's odd. I could swear you were a *police officer*..."

links.title: You: ""Can't we... do something about it?""
links.text: "Can't we... do something about it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should have *done* something ab..."
links.text: "We should have *done* something about the Union ten years ago. That ship has sailed, officer."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant adjusts his collar...."
links.text: The lieutenant adjusts his collar. It's frisky outside.

links.title: You: "Insert a coin."
links.text: Insert a coin.

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "Your money disappears into the coin..."
links.text: Your money disappears into the coin-slot. A clunk, the ring of metal...

links.title: You: "Pull the handle and look inside."
links.text: Pull the handle and look inside.

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "The curtains on the display open. Y..."
links.text: The curtains on the display open. You lean in to catch the view -- it's blurry, different blues and greens. In the middle of the shimmer stands a drab grey shape, like a ghost.

links.title: You: "Turn the knob to focus your vision."
links.text: Turn the knob to focus your vision.

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "The lenses shift, the ghost sharpen..."
links.text: The lenses shift, the ghost sharpens into an islet in the bay. In the ruins a man-made structure is visible: a half-sunken sea-fort, its concrete almost reconquered by nature.

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "It looks as if it was abandoned qui..."
links.text: It looks as if it was abandoned quite some time ago, nothing but a rotten tooth remains of the anti-aircraft tower. A lonely birch tree grows out of it.

links.title: Empathy: "Its leaves ripped from it by the wi..."
links.text: Its leaves ripped from it by the winter wind...

links.title: You: ""Hang in there, little one.""
links.text: "Hang in there, little one."

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "The little brave birch-tree seems t..."
links.text: The little brave birch-tree seems to wave back in the wind.

links.title: You: ""There are ruins of some kind of bu..."
links.text: "There are ruins of some kind of building there..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? I don't have the eyesight..."
links.text: "Really? I don't have the eyesight to make it out..." The lieutenant takes off his glasses and cleans them.

links.title: You: "Could the shot have come from there..."
links.text: Could the shot have come from there? Then entered the window upstairs the Whirling-in-Rags?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Can you tell? From this distance?..."
links.text: "Can you tell? From this distance? I don't think it's possible."

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "It's not. The details are blurry, t..."
links.text: It's not. The details are blurry, there's water vapour in the way and waves cut into the islet...

links.title: Coin-Operated Viewer: "It's not possible to know from this..."
links.text: It's not possible to know from this distance. The details are blurry, there's water vapour in the way and waves cut into the islet...

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Logic: "Why place a tourist attraction in t..."
links.text: Why place a tourist attraction in the middle of such poverty?
